content.raw:
Both examples work fine on my test machine. 

Update: tried pandas 0.19.2 also works for me... I'll continue trying to reproduce the bug

Update 2: Still cant reproduce the bug but it seems to be linked to the global namespace, which is deprecated according to the source code.
Can you compare the value of path to lyse.path? are they equal? If so: are Run and lyse.Run the same? Maybe some import somewhere overwrites them for you.
content.html:
Both examples work fine on my test machine.

Update: tried pandas 0.19.2 also works for me... I'll continue trying to reproduce the bug

Update 2: Still cant reproduce the bug but it seems to be linked to the global namespace, which is deprecated according to the source code. Can you compare the value of path to lyse.path? are they equal? If so: are Run and lyse.Run the same? Maybe some import somewhere overwrites them for you.
